item.title: Ukraine soldier reflects on year of war
item.description: A year ago, as Russia's invasion loomed, Anton Kolumbet was worried. Having seen combat in the Donbas in 2014, he was not keen on fighting again. One year on, DW's Fanny Facsar found him back in uniform, in a Donetsk town near the front line.
